text: Barbara Elizabeth Cornelius "Betsy" Price (born October 21, 1949) is an American businesswoman and politician. She was the 44th mayor of Fort Worth, Texas from 2011 until 2021. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from Fort Worth, Texas Category:Mayors of Fort Worth Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Betsy Price
